mapper.select: where id = #{id} and del_flag='0' ORDER BY no

where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update sys_zck set del_flag='2' where id = #{id}

update sys_zck set del_flag='2' where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: where zcb_id = #{id} and del_flag='0' ORDER BY no

SELECT id FROM (SELECT t1.id, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', id), 0) AS ischild,del_flag FROM (SELECT id, parent_id,del_flag FROM sys_zck t ORDER BY parent_id, id) t1,(SELECT @pids := #{id}) t2) t3 WHERE ischild != 0 AND del_flag='0' OR id = #{id}
